<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2104) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 199 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=82)

**Prerequisites**
[Improvised Pummel](/Feats.aspx?ID=2100)

**Trigger**
An improvised weapon that you are wielding becomes broken as a result of a critical success on an Improvised Pummel.

</column>

---

The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional 3d6 piercing damage to the creature you hit with the [Improvised Pummel](/Feats.aspx?ID=2100). This extra damage you apply on the critical hit doesn't double from the critical hit, as normal.
name: Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)
